Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile

Class TestCacheConfig

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.TestCacheConfig
public class TestCacheConfig extends Object
Tests that CacheConfig does as expected.

    • basicBlockCacheOps

      void basicBlockCacheOps(org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.BlockCache bc, org.apache.hadoop.hbase.io.hfile.CacheConfig cc, boolean doubling, boolean sizing)
      Parameters:
      bc - The block cache instance.
      cc - Cache config.
      doubling - If true, addition of element ups counter by 2, not 1, because element added to onheap and offheap caches.
      sizing - True if we should run sizing test (doesn't always apply).
